text: Hershey's Cookies 'n' Creme is a candy bar made by The Hershey Company and was introduced in 1994. It is a flat, white chocolate bar, shaped cookie bits. The standard-sized bar has 12 rectangular blocks arranged in a 3X4 grid. Category:Chocolate bars Category:The Hershey Company
title: Hershey's Cookies 'n' Creme
